article:
There are multiple things named 'Smith Center':

*Smith Center, Kansas, a small city in the United States
* Smith Center for the Performing Arts, Las Vegas, Nevada *Clarice Smith
  Performing Arts Center, a performance venue at the University of Maryland,
  College Park *Charles E. Smith Athletic Center, an arena at George Washington
  University *Dean Smith Center, an arena at the University of North Carolina -
  Chapel Hill
